prompt.content: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is Bill Gates. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (Bill Gates).

sampled:

I'm Jeff Bezos, the king of the game

Bill Gates, you're no match for me
I'm Jeff Bezos, the one and only
My success is legendary, you're just lonely

Verse 2:

But Amazon's success is something new
I revolutionized the way we shop
While you were stuck in the past, I made it pop

Chorus:
I'm the richest man in the world, can't you see?
Bill Gates, you're no match for me
I'm Jeff Bezos, the one and only
My success is legendary, you're just lonely

Verse 3:
I'm not just a businessman, I'm a visionary
My ideas are revolutionary, yours are ordinary
I'm changing the world, one click at a time
While you're still stuck in the 90s, that's a crime

Chorus:
I'm the richest man in the world, can't you see?
Bill Gates, you're no match for me
I'm Jeff Bezos, the one and only
My success is legendary, you're just lonely

Outro:
So Bill Gates, take a seat and watch me shine
I'm Jeff Bezos, the greatest of all time
My empire will continue to grow
While you're left in the dust, that's just how it goes.
